entry.comment: Poetic plural; Meliboeus is referring to himself.
These all refer to the same person, the "god" to whom Tityrus attributes his new-found leisure.
The death of the twin kids (gemellos) is the evil Meliboeus is referring to.
lit. "struck from the sky", i.e. "by lightning"
"you are considering the Muse", or "you are practising a song", as Musam, in addition to one of the Muses, can metonymically mean a song.
